basics.name: Amal Qurany
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Bachelor of Science in Informatics with years of experience in managing complex IT system from development to production. I also have coaching experience and a DevOps Engineer certificate. Currently, I learn full-stack development as well as freelance. I stay in Padang, a beautiful city in Indonesia with delicious and spicy foods :)

work.name: Glints Academy
work.summary: Guide Indonesian students who take internships in Singapore companies by providing 1on1 mentorship and workshops. The program is in partnership with Kampus Merdeka (an Independent Learning policy from Indonesia’s Ministry of Education, Culture, Research and Technology).

work.name: Xtremax
work.summary: IT infrastructure development and maintenance, cloud service cost analysis, storage management, operations improvement & automation (DevOps), product research, architect & develop IT systems using AWS.

work.name: Artificial Intelligence Lab - ITB
work.summary: Design, develop and test an Android application and its back-end (Automatic Speech Recognition service). Write and present a paper in an international conference.

work.name: GITS Indonesia
work.summary: Design, develop, build and test an android application for news feed using android best practice and News API.

work.name: E-Life Solutions
work.summary: Develop a software system to build an Android app for garages, which can be customized by the garage owner using a web interface. Develop a cross-platform mobile app to print photo using Kiosk machine.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Informatics (Computer Science)
education.finalProject: Development of Mobile Application using Automatic Speech Recognition for Assisting Muroja'ah in Quran Memorization
